alert.note: Alert for Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 11:58AM EST until December 30 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. The highest accumulations will be in western Garrett County and far western Grant County. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett County. In West Virginia, Western Grant County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will increase in coverage overnight and continue through the day on Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
